aka: 酷暑に耐えるインドの母親たち
trans_title: 酷暑に耐えるインドの母親たち
introduction: New research in India suggests heat can double the risk of stillbirth and miscarriage. It comes as the World Health Organisation warns that pregnant women and babies face some of 'the gravest consequences of all' as a result of climate change. The BBC's global health correspondent Tulip Mazumdar reports from southern India. © BBC News
